overview: After finding a note that makes you kill people, Dali try to change the world with this note putting himself in danger and risking his own life . regarding the choices of the spectator , you will be able to decide the fate of Dali and the whole country. Dali will face a lot of dangers including the media propaganda and specially his best friend and room ate Ahmad which is only person who knows about the fact that Dali is the owner of the notebook .
title: Karma: The Interactive Movie
